name: Madness Manifest
description:
Madness Manifest

Madness Manifest is simple Top Down 2D Shooter made in 3 hours (plus a few minutes), where you must escape from Madness.

The idea for the game was to create not only madness in the game but also madness out of the game. Can you get through the game without restarting it?

Game Engine: Godot v3.5.1

Controls

WASD - Move

LMB - Shoot

Space/Enter
